title: Studio for rent [Recently renovated/semi furnished]
description:
WHAT DO YOU OFFER?
A recently renovated, semi-furnished studio is available for rent starting March 1st, 2023. Northeast Philadelphia area. 19116 zip code. Close to Roosevelt Boulevard, I-95, Woodhaven Road, PA-63 and all the other major roads.
WHICH AMENITIES DOES THE UNIT HAVE?
Washer + Dryer
Microwave Oven
Gas Stove
Refrigerator With Freezer
Queen Sized Bed (unless you have your own)
Spacious and modern-looking bathroom
Privacy curtain with plenty of storage space behind
Wi-Fi
Access to backyard area (to be shared with others, of course)
HOW MUCH $ ARE YOU ASKING FOR?
$925/month total price. This number consists of the following payments:
$800 for rent
+
$100 for utilities
+
$25 for shared Wi-Fi access
The tenant will be expected to sign a 12 month lease, after which occupancy will switch to a month by month basis. Initial payment will include the first and last months + a security deposit.
Background and credit history checks will be conducted.
WHO ARE YOU LOOKING FOR?
There's no such thing as an 'ideal' tenant. Everybody's life situation is different. However, we are primarily interested in renting out to one of the following categories:
- A young professional on the up and up
- Working adult with stable income
- A senior citizen/retiree leading a quiet lifestyle
Race, age, sex, religious affiliation, etc. don't matter. No discrimination based on that here.
Pets (cats + small dogs) are welcomed. Just be aware that there is another dog living in the house. He's friendly and playful, but it's best not to let your pets roam around in the backyard unsupervised.
HOW DO I GET IN TOUCH?
Call or text  show contact info
. If no response, feel free to leave a detailed voice message and I'll do my best to get back to you ASAP. Serious inquiries only, let's be respectful of each other's time.

title: Gorgeous 3 Bedroom in Northern Liberties
description:
Gorgeous 3 story townhouse with beautiful hardwood floors and tons of natural light throughout. Entry level has a spacious open floor plan flow, which includes a living space that flows into the kitchen. Kitchen is well appointed with rich dark wood cabinetry and stainless steel appliances.
Off the kitchen there is a quaint outdoor space to take in the summer days. There is a full finished basement with a washer and dryer perfect for extra entertainment space or storage.
The upper levels boast 3 bedrooms. There is a primary en suite with large bathroom and has direct entry to the roof deck. Come see this beautiful townhouse which you will want to call home! Close to public transportation, shopping, grocery and many other conveniences.
Dogs under 25lbs welcome with a $500 deposit. No cats.
Listing is provided by LYL Realty Group

title: Impressive 2 bed 2 bath luxury Brewerytown apt with W/D, C/A & more!
description:
2426 W Thompson St #2 - Absolutely stunning 2 bed 2 bed Brewerytown apt with the amenities you deserve! Available now!
Love at first sight? Your call...but this 2 bed 2 bath second floor Brewerytown apt will certainly take your breath away. From the shiny hardwood flooring to the ample natural
lighting through an obvious abundance of windows...or maybe its the stunning kitchen space with sleek white cabinetry, stainless steel appliances including: a microwave, gas stove, dishwasher; quartz counter tops on top of an incredible kitchen island with a breakfast bar-its obvious that this is not just another ordinary renovation. Enjoy a bright living space adjacent to a kitchen space your inner chef with love. A generously sized master suite (13'11" x 14'5") located in the front of the unit includes double door closet space, a small storage nook as well as a fabulous full ensuite bathroom with a soaker tub accentuated by designer slate tiling. In the rear of the unit you'll find The second bedroom (11'3" x 12'2") which comes complete with windows galore & deep double door closets as well as the the second full bathroom. A pseudo-balcony lies behind an otherwise, mystery door which feels just like a breath of fresh air!
Unit features:
Central Air/Heat
Radiant natural light
Just Renovated
LG Washer/Dryer
Dishwasher
Gas Stove
Video Intercom system
Breakfast Bar

title: Welcome to 530 S 2nd St Fully Furnished Condo in Beautiful Condition!
description:
Welcome to 530 South 2nd Street, Unit 819 a fully furnished condo in beautiful condition! Walk into a newly renovated open concept kitchen, finished with new hardware and cabinetry designed for maximum storage. The kitchen is also equipped with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and a spacious peninsula, perfect for dining and entertaining. Continue into the airy living room where you will find ample space for lounging on the couch or working at the newly custom built-in desk. The couch easily turns into a queen-size sleeper sofa, ideal for hosting friends or family overnight! Off the living room you will find the bedroom, recently fitted with new windows and stylish, yet practical, plantation shutters. The master closet was recently transformed into the ultimate dream closet! Designed by California Closets, no expense was spared to ensure that you will have more than enough space for your wardrobe. Also, off the living room you will find the bathroom with beautiful stone tile throughout, generous storage space, and a shower/tub completed with bath jets. Here you will also find your very own washer and dryer. Not only is the inside of this unit amazing, but the private covered balcony offering picturesque views of the city provides the perfect combination of indoor-outdoor living. This unit comes fully furnished, with all the furniture being in excellent condition. Also included is complete access to the gym in the building, an outdoor garden with seating, 24/7 security, and access to a covered parking garage with the option to rent a parking space. Located in the historic area of Society Hill, this unit is surrounded by charm and beauty. You also can't beat the convenience of being only steps away from award-winning restaurants, bars, coffee shops, bakeries, and more. Don't miss out on the opportunity to make this penthouse unit in Abbotts Square your next home. Owner is related to the listing agent.
530-10 S 2nd St #819

title: Brand-new two-bedroom loft in the Spring Arts section of Philadelphia!
description:
Be the first to live in this brand-new two-bedroom loft in the Spring Arts section of Philadelphia! This unit sits on the top floor of a beautifully restored carriage house. It is a stunning blend of industrial charm and modern sophistication. The spacious open-concept living space boasts vaulted exposed timber ceilings, large windows custom Anderson windows, and beautifully exposed brick walls that add character and warmth. The designer kitchen includes matte black cabinetry, a Samsung appliance package, and an oversized island with natural stone counters and backsplash! Perfect for entertaining guests or simply enjoying a meal at home. The living room is spacious, with plenty of natural light streaming in through the large windows, creating a bright and airy environment, coupled with exposed duct work running the length of the unit. Access control is through a Latch system, with full and total control via your mobile phone. Located in the vibrant neighborhood of Spring Arts, the property is located within walking distance to a brand new full-sized Giant grocer, gyms, cafes, hot new restaurants/bars, and concert venues! This is a quick walk to La Chinesca, Café Lift, Yards Brewery, Love City Brewery, Triple Bottom Brewery, Lucky Well, Juno, Reading Terminal, the newly built rail park, and many many more great establishments/destinations!

title: Welcome to this bright 2 BD / 2 BA apartment on Walnut Street
description:
Welcome to this bright 2 BD / 2 BA apartment on Walnut Street. Enter into an open concept kitchen and living space. The kitchen is complete with stainless steel appliances. Down the hall you'll find the first full bath with a jetted tub. The first bedroom features a lovely exposed brick wall. The second bedroom, offers an en suite bathroom. Please enjoy all Washington Square West has to offer! Steps away from Starbucks, Target, and CVS. Within walking distance to City Hall, Washington Square West, and The Fashion District Mall. Easy commute to Jefferson + Pennsylvania Hospitals. description:
4614 Rising Sun Ave, APT 4, Philadelphia, PA 19140
Coming Soon! A friendly 900-sqft apartment with great balcony. The first level contains a kitchen with high end stainless appliances, a spacious living room , and a conveniently located half bathroom. Upstairs you will find two bedrooms, each featuring a well appointed en suite bathroom and large closets with custom shelving. A laundry room is located in the hall along with a staircase that leads to a private roof deck with unobstructed views. Pet-friendly, sorry smoking not allowed in apartment. Don't miss it...
Within just 1 block of this apartment is septa bus stop 57, septa bus stop 75, a laundromat, Rite Aid pharmacy, 7-eleven, grocery stores, and restaurants!

title: NJ Townhome
description:
Large townhome, 1680sf, 2br/1.5ba. Spacious rooms throughout, freshly painted, many large closets/storage. Newly renovated kitchen, dark wood cabinetry, new stainless appliances (2021-22). Gas heat, electric hot water and cooking. 2nd floor hallway full size maytag washer/dryer.
Fully fenced large private yard. Near NJ turnpike, I-295, 30 min drive to Philadelphia. Very quiet community. Lots of nearby shopping and dining. Car is needed for most errands. Pet is okay with prior approval and veterinary reference. Nonsmoker only. Showings beginning mid-March. More photos to be posted. Application and further property details emailed upon request.
Currently partly furnished with large very clean sectional sofa and 4 seat kitchen dining set.

title: Rittenhouse Square Studio Apartment Home, Gym, Near Grocery Stores
description:
This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home at 806 on the 8th floor features large windows that face north and have a city skyline view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers such as BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home features neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as March 20, 2023!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to grocery stores, restaurants, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Di Bruno Bros., Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, Sue's Produce Market, Venditore by Giordano, Maxx's Produce, Food & Friends, Spruce Food Market, and Reading Terminal Market. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Harp & Crown, Pietro's, a.kitchen, Veda, The Continental Mid-town, Wilder Restaurant, Pizzeria Vetri, Spice Finch, Friday Saturday Sunday, and Trattoria Carina. Buy a loaf of bread or an almond croissant at Metropolitan Bakery. Relax with a manicure at Fleur d'Or Nail Bar & Art. This building is close to the theaters on the Avenue of the Arts. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday year-round. There is so much to do in this area!
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished studio apartment home on 8th floor
* All utilities, except cable and internet, are included
* Large north-facing windows with city skyline view
* Renovated kitchen with granite counters
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Dishwasher
* Garbage disposal
* Renovated bathroom with white tile
* Neutral carpet
Community Amenities:
* Fitness center with park view
* Historic high-rise building on Rittenhouse Square
* Package lockers by Luxer One in 2nd floor package room
* 8,000-square-foot lounge with pool table, conference room, and kitchen
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Dog spa
* Guest suites
* Bicycle storage
* Laundry room on every floor
* Large laundry room on 3rd floor
* Elevator building with front door attendant and concierge
* Online resident portal
* On-site maintenance
* Attached valet parking garage! Parking spaces not managed by community, so the cost is separate.
* Roof deck under renovation
The last image on this ad is an artist rendering of part of the roof deck.
We can furnish a home for you over two weeks following rental application approval and after the home is made ready. Please note that there is a three-month lease term minimum for a furnished home. You would pay a furnished rent.
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 806 is still listed under the Dali floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate at rittenhouseclaridge.com.
Rittenhouse Claridge
Price is for the 22 month lease term. 2 to 22 month lease terms are available!
Rent depends upon lease term and move-in date. Check out our website for current pricing!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.
Welcome home!

title: Rarely Offered Queen Village Townhouse w/ Two Car Parking
description:
Rarely offered, dynamite two bedroom townhouse in the heart of Queen Village including two car FREE PARKING and ALL UTILITIES is now available! The eat-in kitchen features a garbage disposal, dishwasher, heated floors, generous cabinet space and exposed brick. Just off of the kitchen is a private deck which is ideal for grilling, relaxing and entertaining. On the second floor is a large living space with a working fireplace and den, which could double as an office or recreation room. Both rooms have hardwood floors and get an amazing amount of natural light. On the third floor, you'll find two bedrooms with cozy carpeting, a storage closet with laundry and a full bathroom with heated floors. The heated floors can be programmed for your comfort.840 A South American Street is just steps from Royal Sushi and Izakaya, New Wave Cafe, Philadelphia Java Co., Headhouse Farmer's Market, Mario Lanza and Spruce St. Harbor Parks, SEPTA's 57 and 40 bus routes and so much more. No pets please. All utilities are included in the rent (this does not include cable/internet).

Perfect for artists, designers, and start-up businesses looking for professional, private project space for a reasonable price. Facility features: Made up of visual artists, various creative and tech offices, and other artisans, it's a reasonably quiet facility, although periodic machine noise or hand-tools use is perfectly acceptable. It's purposefully not a music rehearsal space, although music listening to reasonable volumes is fine, and recording "in-the-box"(only) and low-volume level mixing is welcome. Each studio has two 4-outlet, dedicated 20-amp electrical circuits. 24-hour access passenger elevator Onsite location of "Mixtape" cafe, serving coffee, espresso, pastries, and sandwiches. clean, professional restroom washout/slop sink less than 100 yards from the Myrtle/Wyckoff L + M train station 24-hour grocery next door stocked with snacks and beer multiple 24-hour restaurants and bodegas very nearby onsite private "zen garden" to chill out and take a break 24-hour onsite security Heat, electrical, and all utilities included A treatment room is available in our Midtown healthcare office on 5th Avenue, minutes from the Penn Station and Grand Central Terminal. We are a friendly group of wellness and integrative medicine practitioners looking for an additional licensed health professional to join us. The office is on the high floor in a beautiful, well-maintained pre-war building. The doorman is on the premises 24/7. Panoramic views of New York City are guaranteed from every treatment room. Our beautiful space is welcoming, clean, and peaceful. Fios, filtered water, and cleaning service are included in this deal. Moves Coworking Studio comes with 24/7 access to four industrial sewing machines and a 4ft x 8ft drafting table and one tier of storage. Our workshop is in a newly renovated loft space that was a furniture factory and warehouse until the 90s. With large windows right at level with the Lorimer JM Trains for the sweetest Brooklyn work experience, and easy access to Manhattan and Brooklyn. The space gets beautiful light, especially reflecting off the trains around sunset. - 200 sq foot shared co working studio within a 600 sq foot clothing design and sewing workshop. (The other 400 sq ft is occupied by 3 other designers or companies and is not shared) - Industrial straight stitch machine - Industrial zig zag - Industrial surger - Industrial coverstitch - 4 ft x 8 ft cutting and drafting table Cover stitch is an advanced machine that may only be accessed after doing a tutorial - Hardwood floors - Freight elevator - Free wifi! - Slop sink - New heating/A C unit - 2 new bathrooms - 24 Hour access - 12 foot ornamented ceilings. - 2 large sound-proof windows. - Fire escape for smoking/thinking/breaking. - Utilities extra. Usually around $10-15/month. Limited storage. You get one tier of a steel shelf. Holds 2 large tubs or many smaller boxes. Shared with 4 other designers/companies. Most of us are very part time. One designer works mornings/afternoons 3-5 days a week. The studio is set up so that 2 to 4 designers can easily make patterns, cut and sew at the same time. Broadway and Wallabout Brooklyn 11206 Best location in Brooklyn. Steps from the JM Train, 5-10 minutes from the G and L trains. On the border of East Williamsburg, (bars, restaurants, Huge grocery store across the street!) and Bushwick (lots of entertainment and artist community resources). We are excited to meet you!

3106 Clifford St #1 – Luxury 3 bed 3 bath home with parking space!
Gorgeous luxury 3 bed 3 bath bi-level apt in Brewerytown area, just a block from Fairmount Park is the perfect place to create new memories! This brand new first and sub level unit atop wonderful hardwood flooring is a one half of a 2 unit modern architectural space, curated with an eclectic mixture of contemporary fixtures amidst a ton of amenities for a higher quality of living. Now imagine you live here! The perfect spot to explore the city on foot, bicycle, or however, you choose.
The first bedroom (10’7″ x 9’6″) sits at the front part of the main level and while big windows are obvious at first sight, ample closet space are one of its best assets! A full bathroom with a stand up shower also sits on the main level. Discover an extravagant kitchen with quartz countertops, sleek white cabinetry, a breakfast bar and stainless-steel appliances including: a refrigerator, microwave, gas stove, dishwasher–which create an ideal setting for meal preparation. The kitchen and living room area make up a bright and open concept floorplan and just off the living room a back entrance/exit which leads out to the driveway wherein your own parking space exists to relieve the parking woes we the citizens of Philadelphia have had bestowed upon us.
The sublevel includes 2 bedrooms (1 bedroom with an ensuite bathroom) located on opposite ends, closet space, a slate tiled bathroom with a large stand up shower, a stacked washer/dryer atop hardwood flooring. 2nd bedroom (12’4”x11’8”) located on the front part of the sublevel, includes closet space. 3rd bedroom (12’3”x12’4”) located in the rear of the sublevel as an ensuite bathroom with a tiled stand up shower, as well as, tons of sunlight.

title: Beautiful courtyards, Smoke-free apartments available
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.
